Question.Subject: Does anyone know what's up with CompUsa?
Question.Content: I have been trying to visit the CompUsa website for two days now. It simply won't load/open. I constantly encounter "The page cannot be displayed". That only occurs for www.compusa.com. Other sites seem to load normal. Did something go wrong with their site?
Question.ChosenAnswer: I was getting the same message. I've tried, but wont load. Something must be going on with their web server.

Answer.Content:
It sounds like something is up with your DNS possibly. I am able to get to their site just fine.
Try going to start -> Run -> type cmd and press enter
type ping compusa.com
If your dns is working properly you should receive 4 Replies. Otherwise you may need to change your dns server settings or contact your ISP.
I was getting the same message. I've tried, but wont load. Something must be going on with their web server.
